title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Throughout his career, he has remained a close ally to the former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner. Between 2021 and 2023, he served as Argentina's Minister of Security in the cabinet of President Alberto Fernández. He has held several cabinet positions under ...

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Durante el gobierno del Presidente Duhalde, Fernández fue designado secretario de Gobierno de la Provincia de Buenos Aires, secretario general de la Presidencia y ministro de producción.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: He worked in these roles for more than nine years in total. He was the Minister of Production, Interior Minister, and Minister of Justice. He also served as the President's Cabinet Chief.
